name: Kakuro Infinite
description:
Kakuro Infinite offers unlimited enjoyment of the classic logic puzzle with a generator as well as a daily puzzle.

Features:
-A kakuro generator that provides new puzzles on demand, with five difficulty levels, from sizes 7x7 to 20x20
-A daily puzzle going from an easy 10x10 on Mondays to a tough 24x14 on Sundays
-Zoomable and draggable solving grid
-Autosave of solving progress
-Candidate mode for inputting cell possibilities
-Tap on a clue to see the possible combinations for that row/column
-Simple error detection; it won't solve the puzzle for you, but it will help you avoid silly mistakes
-Undo for when you've really messed things up anyway
-No in-app purchases, no ads, no point system, no microtransactions, no distracting graphics, just a whole bunch of kakuros waiting to be solved
